backgrounds.name: Gunslinger
backgrounds.backstory: Whether former lawman turned vigilante, notorious outlaw, or professional duelist, your reputation precedes you. The weight of a six-shooter feels like an extension of your arm, and more than a few souls have met their maker at the wrong end of your barrel.
backgrounds.playstyle: Combat-focused with intimidation options. Excel at gunfights but may struggle with wilderness survival.

backgrounds.name: Scout
backgrounds.backstory: The wilderness is your home. Whether you served as an army scout, guided settlers through dangerous territory, or trapped furs in the high country, you know the land better than most know their own homes.
backgrounds.playstyle: Balanced survivalist. Good at exploration and avoiding danger. Recommended for new players.

backgrounds.name: Prospector
backgrounds.backstory: You've chased the dream of striking it rich through played-out gold fields and silver boomtowns. The gold rush may be over, but you know there's still wealth in these hills for those with the patience and know-how to find it.
backgrounds.playstyle: Economy-focused with treasure hunting. Good at finding valuables but weaker in combat.

backgrounds.name: Outlaw
backgrounds.backstory: The law has a price on your head, and for good reason. Whether you fell into banditry through desperation or choice, you've crossed lines that can't be uncrossed. But out here in the territories, a clever outlaw can always find opportunity.
backgrounds.playstyle: High risk, high reward. Better payouts for criminal activities but law enforcement is hostile. Challenging start.

backgrounds.name: Preacher
backgrounds.backstory: You carry the Word to those who need it most - the lost souls of the frontier. Whether a circuit preacher traveling between towns, a missionary to the tribes, or a reformed sinner seeking redemption, your faith gives you strength others lack.
backgrounds.playstyle: Social and support focused. Excellent at negotiations and healing but weak in direct combat.

backgrounds.name: Drifter
backgrounds.backstory: No home, no ties, no past worth speaking of. You drift from town to town, taking work where you find it and moving on when the mood strikes. Your mysterious past is your own business - what matters is the road ahead.
backgrounds.playstyle: Jack of all trades. Balanced stats and faster skill learning. Flexible development path.

backgrounds.name: Tribal Scout
backgrounds.backstory: You walk between two worlds - the ways of your people and the encroaching frontier. Whether serving as a guide, warrior, or mediator, you carry the wisdom of your ancestors while navigating the changing times.
backgrounds.playstyle: Wilderness expert with supernatural connection. Strong tracking and herbalism, unique spirit abilities.

backgrounds.name: Occultist
backgrounds.backstory: You've glimpsed what lies beyond the veil. Whether a hedge witch practicing folk magic, a fortune teller with genuine sight, or someone cursed - or blessed - with supernatural awareness, you know the Weird West is more than just a name.
backgrounds.playstyle: Supernatural specialist. Can detect and interact with weird elements but physically vulnerable. Advanced difficulty.
